casebody.data:
No. 73220 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED APRIL 9, 2019

The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON TRUST COMPANY, NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, f/k/a The Bank of New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A., as Successor to JP Morgan Chase Bank N.A., as Trustee for RAMP 2005-RS8, Appellants,
v.
SFR INVESTMENTS POOL 1, LLC, a Nevada Limited Liability Company, Respondent.

Dismissed.
